subject: Order #SSN3723
description_text:
To whom concerned.

I believe I have ordered

Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration
Feedback × 1

Do they come with mounting plates? Or did I have to buy them separately

Joshua fostet

conversations.body_text: Hi Joshua Foster,  For the vibration motor, we include a motor bracket by default.
Hi Joshua Foster,    They come with mounting brackets, but if you need new ones, you can purchase them at this link.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets
